doc_metadata.home: Tanner Dolby is an applied mathematician and self taught web developer.
doc_metadata.art: A small collection of the CSS artwork I've created over the last few months. I'm looking into drawing with a stylus on iPad to play around with SVG illustrations in the future. These illustrations are quite fun and also bring me alot of joy.
